Already Dead Medium Armor Set
kDesc

The complete Already Dead Medium Armour Set, this bundle contains all five parts that make up the full Already Dead Armour Set: 
 
 1. Already Dead - Medium Assault Body Armour 
 2. Already Dead - Medium Assault Boots 
 3. Already Dead - Medium Assault Gloves 
 4. Already Dead - Medium Assault Helmet 
 5. Already Dead - Medium Assault Leg Armour [#Legal]

L'ensemble complet Armure moyenne Already Dead, avec les cinq éléments composant l'ensemble Armure Already Dead complet : 
 
 1. Already Dead - Gilet d'assaut moyen 
 2. Already Dead - Bottes d'assaut moyennes 
 3. Already Dead - Gants d'assaut moyens 
 4. Already Dead - Casque d'assaut moyen 
 5. Already Dead - Jambières d'assaut moyennes 
 [#Legal]

Das komplette mittelschwere Rüstungsset Already Dead; dieses Bündel enthält alle fünf Bestandteile der kompletten Already Dead-Rüstung: 
 
 1. Already Dead - Panzerweste für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 2. Already Dead - Stiefel für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 3. Already Dead - Handschuhe für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 4. Already Dead - Helm für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 5. Already Dead - Beinrüstung für mittelschwere Angriffe [#Legal]

Set completo di armature d'assalto medio Already Dead, contiene i cinque componenti che compongono l'intero set di armatura Already Dead: 
 
 1. Already Dead - armatura per il corpo d'assalto medio 
 2. Already Dead - stivali d'assalto medio 
 3. Already Dead - guanti d'assalto medio 
 4. Already Dead - casco d'assalto medio 
 5. Already Dead - armatura per le gambe d'assalto medio [#Legal]

El set completo de Armadura media Already Dead, contiene las 5 partes que componen la armadura: 
 
 1. Already Dead - Armadura corporal de asalto media 
 2. Already Dead - Botas de asalto medias 
 3. Already Dead - Guantes de asalto medios 
 4. Already Dead - Casco de asalto medio 
 5. Already Dead - Armadura de asalto media para pierna [#Legal]

완전한 사즉생 중형 방어구 세트입니다. 사즉생 방어구 세트를 완성하는 다섯 개의 아이템으로 구성되어 있습니다:
 
 1. 사즉생 - 중형 돌격 상체방어구 (남성)
 2. 사즉생 - 중형 돌격부츠 (남성)
 3. 사즉생 - 중형 돌격장갑 (남성)
 4. 사즉생 - 중형 돌격헬멧 (남성)
 5. 사즉생 - 중형 돌격 하체방어구 (남성) [#Legal]

 1. Already Dead - Medium Assault Body Armor (Men)
 2. Already Dead - Medium Assault Boots (Men)
 3. Already Dead - Medium Assault Gloves (Men)
 4. Already Dead - Medium Assault Helmet (Men)
